00000000|1
aaaaaabb|b

expand 3^n
11111111|
10000000|0
aaaaaabb|b

expand 2*3^(n-1)
1111111
21111110|
10000000|0
aaaaaabb|b

expand 2*3^(n-2)
2222221
31111100|
10000000|0
aaaaaabb|b

expand 4*3^(n-2)
111111
3222220
31111100|
10000000|0
aaaaaabb|b

carry
11111
100011
0000110
11111100|
10000000|0
aaaaaabb|b

expand 2^(n-4)*3*(n-5)
1111
21111
100011
0000110
11111100|
10000000|0
aaaaaabb|b
